category-def.name: turumbay.domino.osgi
category-def.label: Domino Enhanced Plugins. Turumbay Edition
category-def.description: Bundles set to provide: - OSGI Declarative Services support - Configuration Management support - Scala programming language support - Domino Session - Logging framework (Pax Logging) - Scheduling framework (Apache Sling Scheduler) - REST framework (Restlet)
